Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code that checks the tags and methods of the path is repeated for each entity. It could be extracted into a method that takes the necessary parameters and does the checks.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- String noCreateEntityTag="noCreateEntity";
+ private static final String NO_CREATE_ENTITY_TAG = "noCreateEntity";
Improvements.Description: There are several repeated strings used for tag names. These could be extracted into constants to avoid repetition and potential typos.
